content: Refreshed by food, Dill recited this narrative: having been bound in chains and left to die in the basement, Dill worked himself free by pulling the chains from the wall. Still in wrist manacles, he wandered two miles out of Meridian where he discovered a small animal show and was immediately engaged to wash the camel. He traveled with the show all over Mississippi until his infallible sense of direction told him he was in Abbott County, Alabama, just across the river from Maycomb. He walked the rest of the way. "How'd you get here?" asked Jem.
author: Harper Lee
